attributes.action: advocate the repeal of the 1972 European Communities Act if EU legislation banning the 'pint' is introduced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
SAVE THE PINT!

EU law automatically takes precedence over British domestic law.  If the EU therefore attempt to force us to scrap the 'pint' in favour of a metric equivalent, we should withdraw from the European Union to prevent the 'pint' from becoming obsolete.
